content:
I'm a student studying film and I'm looking for movies similar to the most recent movie directed by Castille Landon. Can you find me some similar movies?
Begin!

function.arguments: {"q":"most recent movie directed by Castille Landon"}
function.name: get_id_for_similar_movies

name: get_id_for_similar_movies
content: The tool output is {"error": "", "response": "{'movies:': [[{'movie': 'The Garfield Movie (2024)', 'id': '69878-garfield'}, {'movie': 'Blue Lock the Movie -Episode Nagi- (2024)', 'id': '96913-blue-lock-the-movie-episode-nagi'}, {'movie': 'The Super Mario Bros. Movie (2023)', 'id': '80277-the-super-mario-bros-movie'}, {'movie': 'Saving Bikini Bottom: The Sandy Cheeks Movie (2024)', 'id': '97590-saving-bikini-bottom-the-sandy-cheeks-movie'}, {'movie': 'Big City Greens the Movie: Spacecation (2024)', 'id': '97648-big-city-greens-the-movie-spacecation'}, {'movie': 'Scary Movie (2000)', 'id': '21937-scary-movie'}, {'movie': 'Scary Movie 2 (2001)', 'id': '21938-scary-movie-2'}, {'movie': 'PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie (2023)', 'id': '84502-paw-patrol-the-mighty-movie'}, {'movie': 'Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train (2020)', 'id': '67938-demon-slayer-the-movie-mugen-train'}, {'movie': 'The Last: Naruto the Movie (2014)', 'id': '15976-the-last-naruto-the-movie'}, {'movie': 'Scary Movie 3 (2003)', 'id': '21939-scary-movie-3'}, {'movie':..., remember to call Finish tool when either if you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

function.arguments: {"final_answer":"I am sorry, I cannot fulfill this request.  I need the name of the most recent movie directed by Castille Landon to find similar movies.","return_type":"give_answer"}
function.name: Finish
